f61250f7-e943-4146-9903-a6226614edea.name: everything is interconnected in life
f61250f7-e943-4146-9903-a6226614edea.description: Everything you do now is dependant and will be interdependant to everything hapenning to you. Thus do your best and leave the rest.

b10b0bc6-e662-40f5-9afc-047e3cbe2606.description:
A good software does not have bugs. It just works - it might be simple or even dummy looking, but it just works without bugs.
A bug is like broken window - have several of them and the value of your building will go down straight to zero.
b10b0bc6-e662-40f5-9afc-047e3cbe2606.name: zero tolerance for bugs
